data.name: Backslash
data.description: I play soccer every week on a team of my friends coworkers – they are software engineers and they needed jerseys designed for their team. Their team name is &lduo;backslash&rduo; (a commonly used computer key in engineering)

data.name: Project Targa
data.description: Sawyer’s new Select Filters and Purifiers use a proprietary foam adsorption technology that is changing the game in water filtration.We created a new piece of micro-content showcasing their newest product line.
